articles.title: 15,000-Year-Old Viruses Were Pulled From a Tibetan Glacier

articles.title: Animals Emerged 350 Million Years Earlier Than Previously Thought, Fossil Discovery Suggests
articles.description: Ancient rocks from northwestern Canada have been found to contain structures consistent with sea sponges. At 890 million years old, they could be the oldest known animal fossils on Earth.Read more...
